title: Welcome to Witfy Origin
subtitle: Create comprehensive brand documentation in minutes
description: This wizard will guide you through 7 steps to build your knowledge base using AI-powered research and visual analysis.

found.title: Existing Session Found
found.description: Found session for {{url}}. Click "Continue" or "Start Fresh"

cleared.title: Session Cleared
cleared.description: New session created. All previous data has been cleared.

session.startFreshConfirm: Starting fresh will create a completely new session. This will clear all your research, documents, and chat history. Are you sure you want to continue?

error.title: Error
error.sessionCreation: Failed to create session. Please try again.
error.startFresh: Failed to start fresh. Please try again.
